The End!(Tragic)
(K) Press K!
Steal.
Youâ€™ve never stolen before, but how hard can it be? It turns out it can be very tricky. 
You get caught red-handed and are handed to the police immediately. 
You find out the justice system is extremely severe and no crime is tolerated in fear of their Goddess. 
You get thrown into the volcano as a sacrifice to her.
